original_text: home alone goes hollywood , a funny premise until the kids start pulling off stunts not even steven spielberg would know how to do . besides , real movie producers aren't this nice .
generated_text:
1. "The Fast and the Furious franchise goes overboard with absurd stunts, losing all sense of reality. Real racing enthusiasts wouldn't condone such reckless behavior."
2. "The Avengers' over-the-top action scenes make me cringe. Who thought it was a good idea to have superheroes perform impossible feats?"
3. "The Matrix Reloaded's elaborate fight choreography is impressive, but it's just too much. I miss the simplicity of the first film."
4. "The Transformers' robot battles are mind-boggling, but they're also ridiculous. Who needs that much destruction on screen?"
